item.title: Outside 46 Agamemnon Road, 22nd September
item.description:
There is a tree outside 46 Agamemnon Road (NW6 1EN) where a branch seems to be hanging rather precariously. It is also hanging quite low and scratching car roofs as they park in the parking spaces around the tree. Could this low hanging branch be removed? Many thanks in advance.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 33, Agamemnon Road, West Hampstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 31 Union Street needs a solution for weekly waste disposal and recycling., 22nd September
item.description:
Residents have no other means in 31 Union Street. Waste collection is inconsistent and from bags placed on the street (for waste and then recycling, which we aim for). Please award the three flats (residential) at SE1 1SD with a proper bin for rubbish and a bin for recycling collection.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 33, Union Street, The Borough, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rosendale Road SE24 at the junction with Norwood Road is “Rosendale Road”, 22nd September
item.description:
Rosendale Road SE24 at the junction with Norwood Road is “Rosendale Road” street name board tagged – plastic vinyl type – side next to 119 / “Westmoreland Lodge” Norwood Road. Please forward fixmystreet.com link to your contractor for picture.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rosendale Road, Tulse Hill, London
